'''''The Stellar Moments Vol. 3''''' is the third character [[soundtrack]] album for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 26 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, all original compositions for the following characters: [[Arataki Itto]], [[Candace]], [[Collei]], [[Cyno]], [[Dori]], [[Gorou]], [[Kamisato Ayato]], [[Kuki Shinobu]], [[Layla]], [[Nahida]], [[Nilou]], [[Shenhe]], [[Shikanoin Heizou]], [[Tighnari]], [[Yae Miko]], [[Yelan]], and [[Yun Jin]].

The album was first announced on January 6, 2023, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 3.4]]. The tracklist was announced on January 9 and the album was later released on January 10.<ref>Sina Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/Mnu3lumUM {{zh|「《原神》第三张角色主题OST即将上线 」}}]</ref>
